casebody.data:
The State ex rel. Black, Appellant, v. Industrial Commission of Ohio et al., Appellees.

[Cite as State ex rel. Black v. Indus. Comm. (1999), 85 Ohio St.3d 339.]

(No. 98-1320 Submitted February 23, 1999 Decided April 21, 1999.) Harris & Burgin L.P.A., Denise L. Devney and Andrea L. Bums, for appellant. Betty D. Montgomery, Attorney General, and William J. McDonald, Assistant Attorney General, for appellees.

*340The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed consistent with the opinion of the court of appeals.

Moyer, C.J., Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur. Douglas, J., dissents.
